product_attributes.name: Self-Adjusting Bra
product_attributes.description:
Crafted to combine exceptional support and easy comfort, this Self Adjusting Bra fits up to 3 different sizes. Great for those who are "in-between" sizes or change size frequently due to edema or weight fluctuation. Made by Q-T Intimates;, this innovative bra has additional eyes and hooks for multiple adjustments with a lightly molded smooth cup with lace at the gore, frame and wings. This wireless bra won't dig or bind, and its nylon-spandex construction provides plenty of stretch for everyday wear. Made with adjustable straps this pretty comfort bra fits your body - and your lifestyle.
86% nylon, 14% spandex
Molded, slightly padded smooth cup bra
Wireless
Adjustable strap length
Imported
See color below
Hand wash and air dry
Sizes: S(36A, 34B, 32C), M(36B, 34C, 32D), L(38B, 36C, 34D), XL(40B, 38C, 36D)

product_attributes.name: UltraSofts® Square Neck Top
product_attributes.description:
With slimming pin-tuck details and a relaxed, non-restrictive fit, our UltraSofts® Square Neck Top looks as good as it feels. Made with soft, easy-care cotton-polyester interlock fabric and a unique square-neck design, this top is a natural match for slacks, shorts and skirts.
Dyed to match our Interlock Pants Item 9850
Square neck shirt with a relaxed, nonrestrictive fit
Slimming front with pin tuck details
Made from our new and improved cotton-polyester interlock fabric
Imported
Machine wash and dry
Sizes: Misses XS, S, M, L; Women's 1X, 2X, 3X
Approx. Lengths: 10264 Misses (25") ; 10265 Women's (26")

product_attributes.name: Big Comfy Sleepshirts
product_attributes.description:
When the lights go out, you'll appreciate the generous, comfortable fit of our Big Comfy Sleepshirt. But when the lights are up, you'll be just as satisfied with the distinctive Henley placket of this short-sleeve sleepshirt. Made of soft, 100% cotton knit, this oversized nightshirt provides everything you need for a perfect night's sleep.
100% knit cotton
Oversized nightshirt
Available in beautiful jeweltone colors
Imported
Machine wash and dry.
One size (Misses & Womens available)
Approx. Length: Misses 46"; Womens 48"

product_attributes.name: Big Comfy Sleepshirts
product_attributes.description:
When the lights go out, you'll appreciate the generous, comfortable fit of our Big Comfy Sleepshirt. But when the lights are up, you'll be just as satisfied with the distinctive Henley placket of this short-sleeve sleepshirt. Made of soft, 100% cotton knit, this oversized nightshirt provides everything you need for a perfect night's sleep.
100% knit cotton
Oversized nightshirt
Available in beautiful jeweltone colors
Imported
Machine wash and dry.
One size (Misses & Womens available)
Approx. Length: Misses 46"; Womens 48"
